name: Sirimania
overview:
“Zero is not just another price, The Zero is a powerful emotional button - a source of irrational excitement” - Dan Ariely in Predictably irrational.

The SiriMania is the first and only site offers free (100% off) that absorbs the concept of social commerce to promote brands through social networks. In our mechanics, the public does advertising for businesses in return for gratuity, reducing the need for investment in traditional media, focusing all marketing activity in one place and with excellent results.

This action generates for the business owner more than a propaganda directed, encourages consumers to pass on to others, their social context, information and / or statements about their products and services. This strategy of marketing buzz gets more speed over the internet between social networks, multiplying this message to thousands and even millions of people with only a first click.
